## parseStringEncodedColor() function

Parse string encoded color value using all known \[\[StringEncodedColorFormats\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function parseStringEncodedColor(color: string): number | undefined;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  color | string | The string encoded color expression (i.e. '\#FFF', 'rgb(255, 0, 0)', etc.). |

<b>Returns:</b>

number \| undefined

The color parsed or \_\_undefined\_\_ if non of the known representations matches the expression provided in \[\[color\]\].
